1.title: Witch Came First
1.plot: Mel is visited by her gynecologist who says she's a so called witch. She explains to Mel that she was once a powerful teenage witch and can regain her powers by defeating the dark lord.

2.title: A Melanie & Josiah Christmas
2.plot: It's Mel and Joe's first Christmas as a couple, which leads to a competition over whose family ornament should take the prestigious top spot on the tree.

3.title: The Honeymooners
3.plot: When their honeymoon to Tahiti gets canceled due to Mel's broken leg, Joe surprises her with a cabin getaway. But their dream vacation quickly becomes a nightmare. Meanwhile, Lennox tries to hide her relationship with Marco.

4.title: The Day After
4.plot: Cool stepmom Aunt Mel is forced to choose between following Joe's wishes and keeping a secret for Dani.

5.title: Let's Get It Started
5.plot: Joe tries to convince Mel that the time is right to start a family; Zander dates Lennox's friend.

6.title: Failure to Communicate
6.plot: Mel hires an expert to repair the family's computer, despite Joe's claims he can fix the machine.

7.title: Thanks But No Thanks
7.plot: Joe returns a fancy wedding gift from Mel's Aunt Bunny and Uncle Bert and then learns that they are going to pay a visit. The future of Lennox and Marco's relationship is in question when he gets a job that is in Japan.

8.title: Face the Music
8.plot: Mel discovers that Dani is a musician, but Joe's secret past as a member of a boy band causes him to be unsupportive.

9.title: Being There
9.plot: Joe becomes fed up with how much technology is impeding the family communication, leading to a pledge of no cell phones or computers all weekend long.

10.title: Parental Guidance
10.plot: Mel is jealous when Lennox becomes infatuated with her professor. Joe is reluctant to cancel and father daughter camping trip when he finds out Dani lied to him.

11.title: Gone Girl
11.plot: Joe makes the difficult decision to call Felicia when he learns that Dani has broken the rules.

12.title: You Say You Want an Ovulation
12.plot: Mel and Joe try to conceive a child as quickly as possible; Ryder wonders what to do with his life.

13.title: Call of Duty
13.plot: Mel and Joe are reeling from both the pregnancy test results and Ryder's announcement that he's joining the Navy. Feeling Ryder is completely unprepared, they hatch a plan to have Joe put him through a rigorous mock Boot Camp.

14.title: You Little Devil
14.plot: When Joe learns the significance of the little devil tattoo on Mel's backside, it's a big turnoff for him in the bedroom. Meanwhile, Lennox and Zander are forced to work with an untrained actress on their "Cassandra" short film.

15.title: The Book Club
15.plot: Mel's thrilled when bestselling author of the novel "Love and Bondage," visits her book club. Nicole overhears Joe criticize her work, and ends up trying to seduce him. Lennox discovers Zander and McKenna are secretly dating.

16.title: The Early Shift
16.plot: Joe gets a new job as a correspondent for "Wake Up, Toledo!", a local early morning TV show, that requires him getting up early every day, which puts a strain on his relationship with Mel.

17.title: The Parent Trap
17.plot: Mel's father and Joe's mother hit it off; Lennox and Zander explore being "friends with benefits."

18.title: Melissa & Joey's Frozen
18.plot: After being frozen in an avalanche on a ski trip, Mel and Joe thaw out 100 years in the future.

19.title: Put a Ring on It
19.plot: Joe goes all out for a birthday gift for Mel that she doesn't like.

20.title: Game Night
20.plot: On a family game night, questions and answers lead to a breakdown of Mel/Joe's and Lennox/Zander's relationships.

21.title: Be the Bigger Person
21.plot: Mel and Joe gear up to announce her congressional campaign, but Joe worries that the stress is causing Mel to be ill.

22.title: Double Happiness
22.plot: When Mel and Joe receive unexpected news, Mel doubts that she can still run for congress.

1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Mel must hire a manny when her niece and nephew are sent to live with her.

2.title: Moving On
2.plot: Joey moves under Melissa's roof to make his childcare work easier. Meanwhile, at her work, Melissa meets a man and decides to go on a date with him. The new 56-inch flat-screen TV disrupts the status quo of the household.

3.title: Nanny Love
3.plot: Joe finds it difficult to meet women while working as a nanny.

4.title: Boy Toys 'R' Us
4.plot: Lennox starts dating a bad boy that Mel disapproves of.

5.title: The Perfect Storm
5.plot: Mel's father's visit causes lots of tension.

6.title: Spies & Lies
6.plot: Mel starts to spy on Joe when she becomes suspicious of his intentions.

7.title: Up Close & Personal
7.plot: Mel upset that her boss didn't give her credit for a project she worked on, decides to let a news crew film her at work but when it appears she rehearsed all of her actions, they want to quash the story. Mel asked them not to, so they ask her to film her at her home and still the kids are just following what Mel told them to do so the reporter wants to drop it. Unless they're allowed to film Joe which he reluctantly does and comes out out shining Mel.

8.title: Dancing with the Stars of Toledo
8.plot: Mel decides to join a dancing competition. Joey offers to be her partner. Mel is difficult, eventually they have a falling out. Jennox convinces Joe to be the bigger man. Joe does but Mel gets Mark Ballas to be her partner.

9.title: Seoul Man
9.plot: When it's revealed that a city employee has an undocumented worker, all city employees must provide documentation that any one who works for them is legal. So Mel asks Joe for his documents. But he doesn't know where they are. So unless he can produce Mel might have to let him go.

10.title: In Lennox We Trust
10.plot: Mel brings Lennox to a convention where she meets the mayor's son, Brett.

11.title: A Fright in the Attic
11.plot: It's Halloween. The kids' father comes to see them and instead of telling Mel or Joe he's back they hide him in the attic. Mel and Joe couldn't help but hear noises coming from the attic. A neighbor tells them that someone who lived in the house was found dead in the attic.

12.title: Joe Knows
12.plot: Joe decides to make an instructional video on how to handle your financial matters. Mel decides to invest. When his initial video doesn't sell. Mel decides to jazz it up with Joe working out.

13.title: Enemies with Benefits
13.plot: Joe's ex, Tiffany, tries to rekindle their relationship.

14.title: Don't Train on My Parade
14.plot: Joe takes an interest in Mel's personal trainer.

15.title: Lost in Translation
15.plot: A dinner between Mel, a Japanese businessman, and Joe, turns awkward.

16.title: Joe Versus the Reunion
16.plot: Mel surprises Joe at his college reunion, pretending to be his girlfriend.

17.title: Toledo's Next Top Model
17.plot: Lennox is approached to be a model, but has to persuade Mel for permission.

18.title: The Mel Word
18.plot: Mel plans a wedding at her home.

19.title: Auction Hero
19.plot: Mel volunteers Joe for a school charity auction.

20.title: Waiting for Mr. Right
20.plot: Mel feels the pressure to find someone.

21.title: Young Love
21.plot: Mel starts a romance with a younger man.

22.title: Mel and Joe's Anniversary
22.plot: George throws a party for Mel to meet his friends.

24.title: All Politics is Local
24.plot: Mel's father returns to lobby for a bill Mel is against.

25.title: The Other Longo
25.plot: Joe's younger half-brother visits and takes an interest in Mel.

26.title: Teacher/Teacher
26.plot: Joe gets Ryder in trouble with his teacher.

27.title: Play Ball
27.plot: Mel recruits Joe to play on her office softball team.

28.title: A House Divided
28.plot: Joey can't stand the neighbor's bird. When he tells Mel he wants to talk to him, Mel tells him not to. But when the bird gets too much, he goes there, and the man wants to get rid of the junk on his property, which is Mel's. Later they learn that part of the house is on his property and after a certain period of time, he forfeits his rights so they try to be nice to him. Ryder wants to shoot a PSA about texting and driving with Lennox and a jock as the stars, but she doesn't want to do it.

29.title: Do as I Say, Not as I Did
29.plot: Mel convinces Joe to follow Lennox to her school dance.

30.title: The Settlement
30.plot: Mel and Joe are faced with difficult decisions.

1.title: I Can Manage
1.plot: Mel and Joe are at odds with a contractor for their home renovation.

2.title: If You Can't Stand the Heat
2.plot: Lennox reluctantly works on the student spirit committee.

3.title: Good to Go
3.plot: Mel and Joe discover Lennox spent the night in bed with her classmate.

4.title: All Up in My Business
4.plot: Joe suspects Mel is having an affair with a married man.

5.title: The Knockout
5.plot: A video of Mel punching a guy in Ryder's defense is posted online.

6.title: Breaking Up Is Hard to Do
6.plot: Mel asks Joe to give some advice to Donald to help him get a job.

7.title: Mixed Doubles
7.plot: Mel and Joe set each other up on blind dates!

8.title: The Donor
8.plot: Mel's friend wants to have a baby with Joe.

9.title: Eat, Pray, Date
9.plot: Mel's date thinks Joe's cooking is something Mel made.

10.title: Pretty Big Liars
10.plot: Lennox breaks up with Haskell, she then decrees that his name not be uttered at all. But Mel runs into his father, he asks Mel out. She accepts and lies to Lennox about it. Joe is extremely critical of her actions. But when Ryder wants to invest some money he got, Joe agrees to handle it. And Ryder wants to buy a stock which Joe doesn't think will do well. But Ryder insists. And Joe told him he did when in reality he didn't. But when the stock soars, Joe finds himself in a pickle. And Mel tells him shame on him for lying.

11.title: A Pair of Sneakers
11.plot: Joe gives driving lessons to Lennox without Mel's consent.

12.title: Mother of All Problems
12.plot: Mel's mother comes to visit and Lennox's teacher thinks Lennox is pregnant.

13.title: Wherefore Art Thou Lennox
13.plot: Joe works as a financial consultant over the internet.

14.title: From Russia with Love
14.plot: Joe's financial consultant, Elena, shows up at the house unannounced.

15.title: Mel Marries Joe
15.plot: Joe proposes to Elena to save her from being sent back to Russia.

1.title: Works for Me
1.plot: Joe no longer feels needed as a nanny.

2.title: Toxic Parents
2.plot: Mel dates a guy whose ex-wife happens to be dating Joe.

3.title: Inside Job
3.plot: Joey learns that there's a job at City Hall for someone with his (financial) skills and Mel didn't tell him about it because she didn't want it to appear that she was giving him preferential treatment. She agrees to let him be interviewed and the ones who will decide if gets the job are her and another councilman. At the interview the councilman thinks Joey is the right man. But Joey discovers something going on and tells Mel about it, he then tells the councilman about it who tells him to forget about it because he's the one behind it and if Joey blows the whistle ...

4.title: Can't Hardly Wait
4.plot: When Joey hurts himself because he was trying to hook up with a girl he just met. Mel tells him to try and slow down, try to get to know the girl before he does anything with her. Joey doesn't think she knows what she's talking about. But when he goes to the chiropractor and sees that she's attractive, he decides to take things slow. And when he learns she's never been with anyone, he freaks out. Zander sees that Ryder wrote a graphic novel and he wants to work together to make it a comic. When Zander asks Lennox to help them, things get messed up.

5.title: Oh Brother
5.plot: Mel reconnects with a childhood friend.

6.title: The Truth Hurts
6.plot: Joe foils Mel and Austin's weekend plans.

7.title: The Unkindest Cut
7.plot: Mel and Austin have different opinions on the possibility of being parents.

8.title: The Unfriending
8.plot: Mel severs ties with a high maintenance friend who Joe then begins to date.

9.title: Something Happened
9.plot: Mel scrambles to re-establish her relationship with Lennox.

10.title: Family Feud
10.plot: Mel and Joe co-host Good Morning Toledo, the local TV news show.

11.title: Fast Times
11.plot: After a failed relationship, Mel tries to fast-track her new suitor.

12.title: Bad Influence
12.plot: Mel is anxious to track down a personal video.

13.title: Teach Your Children
13.plot: Joe's tutoring business lands him in hot water.

14.title: What Happens in Jersey...: Part 1
14.plot: Joe hatches a plan to disguise Mel as his ex-wife Tiffany.

15.title: What Happens in Jersey...: Part 2
15.plot: Mel and Joe find themselves in a compromising situation.

16.title: A New Kind of Family Christmas
16.plot: After Joe's flight is cancelled, he ends up spending Christmas with Ryder and Lennox's mother Meredith, who destroyed his career.

17.title: A Decent Proposal
17.plot: Austin's return throws a wrench in Joe's plan. Lennox tries to convince Mel and Joe they belong together.

18.title: Independence Day
18.plot: Joe embraces the idea of courting Mel by looking for a new job and separate living quarters. Lennox and Zander collaborate on a web series.

19.title: The New Deal
19.plot: Joe tries to make his relationship with Mel work while working as a nanny. Ryder searches for a new look for the up coming school year.

20.title: Feel the Burn
20.plot: Joe launches a personal fitness business. Lennox and Zander sell their web series.

21.title: Plus One
21.plot: Joe stirs controversy at one of Mel's work events. Joe coaches Ryder on how to ask out Stella. Lennox and Zander make a decision about their future.

22.title: House Broken
22.plot: Mel gets a dog for her household, unintentionally showing her desire for a baby. Ryder strives to make his relationship work with Stella.

23.title: Couples Therapy
23.plot: Mel and Joe see a couple's therapist who turns out to be one of Joe's exes. Zander returns home to question Lennox's principles.

24.title: To Tell the Truth
24.plot: Mel and Joe's friendship with another couple is jeopardized when a secret is revealed. Zander comes to Ryder for help after he flunks out.

25.title: My Roof, My Rules
25.plot: Mel and Joe must get past their differences and figure out how to parent a child who is legally an adult.

26.title: The Chaperones
26.plot: Mel and Joe chaperone a dance. Ryder's relationship with Stella takes a big step.

27.title: I'll Cut You
27.plot: Joe is rear-ended by Mel's hairdresser and Mel struggles to choose sides. Ryder seeks advice from Lennox.

28.title: Catch & Release
28.plot: Mel wonders if she can trust Joe when his old buddy Charlie enlists him as a wingman. Lennox becomes jealous when she meets Zander's new roommates.

29.title: Born to Run
29.plot: Mel announces her candidacy for the state senate election.

30.title: More Than Roommates
30.plot: Mel convinces Joe that their house should be a reflection of both of them. Zander invites Ryder to his new apartment and gets mistaken for a college student.

31.title: Accidents Will Happen
31.plot: Mel takes a pregnancy test. Lennox and Zander's relationship takes a twist.

32.title: Right Time, Right Place
32.plot: Tensions rise between Mel and Joe when Mel's dream wedding locale suddenly becomes available in four weeks.

33.title: Don't Look Back in Anger
33.plot: In a special clip episode, Mel and Joe meet with a counselor to discuss their relationship. As they look back on their years together, they quickly decide that honesty is not the best policy.

34.title: Uninvited
34.plot: Joe's mother Gloria shows up uninvited to help Mel with wedding preparations. Lennox steps in to help Ryder when he misses the college application deadline.

35.title: You're the One That I Want
35.plot: As Melissa and Joey's wedding day approaches, his family shows up. Joey and the guys go dirt biking but because of Ryder, Joey gets hurt. Mel goes partying with Joey's mom and sis, when they come home, his sister tells Mel something about Joey that even Joey doesn't know about. Joey's nephew whom Lennox hooked up when they were in New Jersey shows up and wants to reconnect but she's trying to work things out with Zander.

36.title: Maybe I'm Amazed
36.plot: Mel reconsiders her wedding plans when she discovers startling news about Joe's past.

37.title: At Last
37.plot: Joe invites his family to move into the house; Zander attempts to win Lennox back from Marco.

locations: Stage 14, CBS Studio Center - 4024 Radford Avenue, Studio City, Los Angeles, California, USA
imdb.title: Melissa & Joey
plot: After a family scandal leaves Mel, a local politician, alone with her niece and nephew, she hires a man named Joe to become the family's male nanny, or "manny".
